name: SS-GREETING
positive_description: This was easy! You've welcomed the client!
negative_description: You should always begin a conversation with a greeting.

name: GA-GAME_TYPES
positive_description: You've explained correctly the different game types!
negative_description: Try to list out all game types and explain their differences.

name: GA-DECISION
positive_description: Well done! You've helped the client to make his dicision.
negative_description: Games may have high jackpot or high winning probability. Help the client with his decision.

name: GA-JACKPOT
positive_description: You've pointed out the amount of the jackpot and it's day of draw.
negative_description: Point out the amount of the jackpot and it's day of draw

name: GA-ALTERNATIVE_GAMES
positive_description: You've mentioned enough alternative games and expained them well.

name: GA-CHECKING_PROFIT
positive_description: Perfect! You've explained how the profit might be checked.
negative_description: You should explain how the profit might be checked.

name: GA-CONDITIONS
positive_description: Awesome! You've mentioned all the game conditions.
negative_description: You have to explain the game conditions to the customer!
